titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent dividends received from corporations in tax havens from receiving a reduced tax rate.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent dividends received from corporations in tax havens from receiving a reduced tax rate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of qualified foreign corporation for purposes of qualifying dividends paid by such corporations for preferential tax rates to require that such corporations be created or organized in a foreign country that has a comprehensive tax system.
